TopicTitle: Looking for a mod that let you really discover the kerbin universe

Articles.Content:
Hi there!

I have a question or maybe even a mod request. My question is: Does there exist a mod for ksp that really let you start with just the knowledge of the planets you can see. So you really have to discover what Jool's orbit is or Duna's orbit. And you only know the Mun en the Sun. So does a mod like this exist or not?

Thank you!

Wobelaar
Something at least very much like it: ResearchBodies.

Research Bodies is the mod you want!

It even pairs with some of the telescope mods like CactEye and TST.

check out Distant Object Enhancement also, so you can actually see planets in the night sky.

Thank you guys that's exactly where I was looking for!

P.S. I'm so happy with this forum I mean everybody is almost all the time nice te each other and you guys are also always very helpfull Thank YOU ALL!!

P.P.S. Sorry for my bad English probably the sentence above has some mistakes in it but you get the message I think
